mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STAFF_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN IMAGES B ON A.ID_PICTURE_IDX = B.IMAGE_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES C ON A.HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX = C.FILE_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES D ON A.RESUME_IDX = C.FILE_IDX

SELECT A.NAME, A.NAME_ENG, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.TEL_NO) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.TEL_NO,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(A.TEL_NO,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.TEL_NO,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.TEL_NO,7,4)) END AS TEL_NO, A.ADDRESS, DATE_FORMAT(A.START_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') START_DATE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = A.WORKER_TYPE) WORKER_TYPE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = A.STAFF_GRADE) STAFF_GRADE, (SELECT OFFICE_NAME FROM OFFICE_INFO WHERE OFFICE_ID = A.OFFICE_ID) OFFICE_ID, A.ID_PICTURE_IDX, A.HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX, A.RESUME_IDX, A.REG_DATE, A.REG_ID, A.UPD_DATE, A.UPD_ID, A.STAFF_ID, CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'A' THEN '근무' ELSE '퇴근' END AS STATUS, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') END_DATE, B.DATA ID_PICTURE, C.DATA HEALTH_CERTIFICATE, D.DATA RESUME FROM STAFF_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN IMAGES B ON A.ID_PICTURE_IDX = B.IMAGE_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES C ON A.HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX = C.FILE_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES D ON A.RESUME_IDX = C.FILE_IDX LIMIT #{startPage}, #{recordsPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STAFF_INFO ( NAME, NAME_ENG, TEL_NO, ADDRESS, START_DATE, WORKER_TYPE, STAFF_GRADE, OFFICE_ID, ID_PICTURE_IDX, HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX, RESUME_IDX, REG_DATE, REG_ID, STAFF_ID, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{nameEng}, #{telNo}, #{address}, #{startDate}, #{workerType}, #{staffGrade}, #{officeId}, #{idPictureIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthCertificateIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{regId}, STAFF_ID_SEQ_NEXTVAL(), 'A' )
